description: Get The User Defined Data Types with its Properities
body:
/* =============================================================================================================================================================
-- Database		: USER_DATABASE
-- Script		: GetUserDefinedDataTypes
-- Description	: Get The User Defined Data Types with its Properities
============================================================================================================================================================= */
SELECT UT.name AS "UserDefinedtype",
	   UT.user_type_id AS "UserTypeID",
	   UT.system_type_id AS "SystemTypeID",
	   ST.name AS "SystemDataType",
	   UT.max_length as "MaxLength", --This Value Applies Only for DataTypes IN ( 'varchar', 'char', 'nvarchar', 'nchar' )
	   UT.precision AS "Precision", --This Value Applies Only for DataTypes IN ( 'decimal', 'numeric' )
	   UT.scale AS "Scale", --This Value Applies Only for DataTypes IN ( 'decimal', 'numeric' )
	   ST.name --
		   + CASE
				 WHEN ST.name IN ( 'image', 'text', 'uniqueidentifier', 'date', 'time', 'datetime2', 'datetimeoffset', 'tinyint', 'smallint', 'int', 'smalldatetime', 'real', 'money', 'datetime', 'float', 'sql_variant', 'ntext', 'bit', 'smallmoney', 'bigint', 'varbinary', 'binary', 'timestamp', 'xml' ) THEN ''
				 WHEN ST.name IN ( 'decimal', 'numeric' ) THEN '(' + CAST(UT.precision AS VARCHAR(4)) + ', ' + CAST(UT.scale AS VARCHAR(4)) + ')'
				 WHEN UT.max_length = -1 THEN '(max)'
				 WHEN ST.name IN ( 'nvarchar', 'nchar' ) THEN '(' + CAST(UT.max_length / 2 AS VARCHAR(5)) + ')'
				 ELSE '(' + CAST(UT.max_length AS VARCHAR(5)) + ')'
			 END AS "ConfiguredSystemType",
	   UT.collation_name AS "CollationName",
	   UT.is_nullable AS "IsNullable",
	   UT.is_user_defined AS "IsUserDefined"
FROM sys.types AS UT --Aliasing as "UserTypes"
INNER JOIN sys.types AS ST --Aliasing as "SystemTypes"
	ON UT.system_type_id = ST.user_type_id
WHERE 1 = 1
	AND UT.is_user_defined = $bit$; -- 1 = UserDefinedType | 0 = SystemDefinedType
